name: Digital Module Technologies
description:
Digital Module Technologies is a rapidly growing IT company with extensive experience in designing and developing cutting-edge custom software and Web Solutions. We are a group of highly motivated IT professionals with strong desire to excel, and ability to innovate.
Digital Module Technologies is Canada based organization with focus on various services i.e. POS, Web Consultancy, Web Design & Development, Web Maintenance, Payment Gateway, Custom Software Development, SEO, CCTV Security Camera etc.
